context: Expedia faced pandemic devastation and leadership changes. The company owns Expedia, Hotels.com, Vrbo, Orbitz, Travelocity, and Trivago. Vrbo vacation rentals provided resilience.

competitors.name: Booking Holdings
competitors.notes: Larger OTA competitor with Booking.com dominance

competitors.name: Google Travel
competitors.notes: Travel search threatening OTA discovery model

competitors.name: Hotel Direct
competitors.notes: Hotels pushing direct bookings during recovery
